name: Better Ladder
author: ywkls
info: A scripted ladder, for when a regular one just won't do.
description: Ever get tired of trying to get the built-in ladder to work right?Do you wish that there was an alternative which allowed you to do the same thing more easily?This script functions similarly to the normal ladder, but with fewer headaches!Allows you to equip the item to the A or B button.Can cross Ladder Only, Ladder or Hookshot and Water combos.Update9-19-21Fixed bug which made the use of the ladder limited to 32 times per screenAdded 4-way ladder functionality
setup: Made in ZC version 2.53, Beta 52Please use this or newer to avoid bugsRequires std.zh, ffcscript.zhCreate a combo to be used to represent the ladderCreate a walkable comboCreate an item which represents the ladder (should be an actual ladder)
